Description: Offered for your consideration we have a super clean, 2000 Gibson Les Paul Classic Gold Top. Plays great, sounds even better. Overall in excellent plus condition, showing very little play wear, considering it's a 19 year old instrument. I believe the previous owner installed the pick up covers and changed the pick up rings as well. Although, the original pick up rings are included. Killer guitar!! The original hard shell case is included. It appears a previous owner forgot the combo, and had to "break into" the lock on the case. So, it's been somewhat repaired as shown. The case and latches still functions properly. JUST FOR FUN, THIS BE AN OLD SCHOOL, NO RESERVE AUCTION. The Fretboard Music Co. is dedicated to bringing you the finest vintage guitars and related equipment. On occasion, we dable in other realms of collectibles and Rolex watches, so you will never know what we'll have on auction. You'll see everything from player grade instruments to pristine high end vintage and everything in between.We are hard working people and strive to give honest evaluations and descriptions. Our goal is to make each and every purchase a pleasurable one. So bid with confidence.....EST. 1979! WE'VE SHIPPED HUNDREDS OF ITEMS WORLDWIDE!NOT OUR FIRST RODEO.WE HAVE A FABULOUS POSITIVE FEEDBACK RECORD AND INTEND TO KEEP IT THAT WAY! SO, NO WORRIES. PAYMENT IS DUE IMMEDIATELY AT THE CLOSE OF THE AUCTION OR ACCEPTED OFFER.
Title: MINT! 2000 Gibson Les Paul Classic Gold Top 1960 Reissue Electric Guitar w/ OHSC
